[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-stdlib/src/natives/mod.rs] [Event Module Registration] [Event emission DoS] Can the write_to_event_store function with incorrect unit_cost allow attackers to emit unlimited events cheaply, filling storage and causing validator disk exhaustion? (High)
